name: M Q

review_text: Sue became a great place to pick up your food to go. The staff is accommodating if you would like to sit, but for the most part, it is a takeout set up. The food never disappoints here. It is one of my go to places.

review_text: The food was really good and authentic, the service was phenomenal, and the location was really convenient for me. Will be going there again.
